header.title: Get Answers to Your Foxi Questions
header.text: Find answers to common questions about Foxi

pricing.title: Understanding Our Pricing Plans
pricing.text: Get all the details on Foxi's pricing plans. Learn about the costs, discounts, and subscription options to find the best plan that fits your needs and budget.

valueSection.title: Why Foxi's Pricing Plans Offer Great Value
valueSection.alttext: Why Foxi's Pricing Plans Offer Great Value
valueSection.text: At Foxi, we believe in providing exceptional value at every price point. Our pricing plans are designed to cater to a variety of needs, from individuals and small teams to large enterprises. Each plan includes access to our powerful features, seamless integrations, and top-notch customer support.

integrations.title: Integrations Made Easy
integrations.text: Discover how Foxi seamlessly integrates with your favorite tools and platforms. From Google Calendar to Slack, find out how to connect and enhance your productivity with powerful integrations.
